title: sync fails with error code 22 for a subdirectory "core"
body:
"core" subdirectory  exists in data/files subdirectory and in the database, but not in data/files_versions directory.
starting sync fails with error.
happens several times (i correctes 2 times), and always with a "core" subdirectory (different subdirectories and directory depth, so the name seems to be the problem, not the location).

log:
01-23 10:39:26:595 csync_ftw: checking for read from db for owncloud://www.mysite.de/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/development/openactivity/api/_intended/development_sik/development/openactivity/api/zip4j/src/net/lingala/zip4j/core: 0
01-23 10:39:26:595 oc_module: opendir method called on owncloud://www.mysite.de/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/development/openactivity/api/_intended/development_sik/development/openactivity/api/zip4j/src/net/lingala/zip4j/core
01-23 10:39:26:876 oc_module: request failed, don't take session header.
01-23 10:39:26:876 oc_module: neon error code was 1
01-23 10:39:26:876 oc_module: wrn: propfind named failed with 1, request error: 403 forbidden
01-23 10:39:26:876 oc_module: errno set to 22
01-23 10:39:26:876 csync_ftw: opendir failed for owncloud://www.mysite.de/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/clientsync/development/openactivity/api/_intended/development_sik/development/openactivity/api/zip4j/src/net/lingala/zip4j/core - invalid argument (errno 22)
